referralForm.title: Referral Form
referralForm.name: Name
referralForm.phoneMessage: Enter the clients phone number in local format, example: 012999888
referralForm.confirmLeavePage: Form has not been saved! Please confirm that you want to leave this page?

login.text: You have successfully verified your email. For your security, please log in now.

signUp.passwordRules: Password must have at least 8 characters
signUp.passwordRules1: Must have at least one uppercase character
signUp.passwordRules2: Must have at least one number
signUp.passwordRules3: Must have at least one lowercase character

signUpEnterCode.title: Confirm Account
signUpEnterCode.paragraph2: for a confirmation code and submit it below.

checkList.header: Does the person you wish to refer have the following:
checkList.question2: Cambodia Overseas worker card (Card issued by the Cambodian Government)
checkList.question3: Black Passport (document issued by the Cambodian Government)
checkList.question4: Work Visa (document or stamp in your Black passport) or Work Permit (issued by the country you are moving to)
checkList.question5: Employment Contract (issued by the person you plan to work for) or Service Contract / Guarantee Agreement (an agreement between you and a recruitment agency)
checkList.question6: Do you have these documents with you?
checkList.question7: Do you know where you can access support and help in your destination country?
checkList.confirmLeavePage: You are still in the process of collecting a new referral. Please confirm that you want to leave the current process and start a new referral?

safeMigration.text1: The client who you are talking to appears to have safe migration plans.
safeMigration.text2: Press 'Next' to return to the Home page.

unsafeMigration.text1: The client who you are talking to appears to have unsafe migration plans.
unsafeMigration.text2: Please ask for their consent to pass on their details to a safe agency that can help make sure they and their family are safe.
